Terms & Conditions*

*	The invite shouldn’t be forwarded to anyone else than the recipient of this email
*	ID should be presented at the entrance in order to be admitted
*	No pictures or videos are allowed during the sale. Phone covers will be provided at the entrance.
*	Maximum 6 Items
*	No Refunds or Exchange
*	Card payment only
*	One-time entry
*	No carryon and/or tote bags are allowed in the sale venue. Alternatively, shopping bags will be provided at the venue entrance.

 

*Failure to comply with these T&Cs will result in the cancellation of your booking

 

We advise you to arrive only during your booked slot to avoid unnecessary queuing.

 

Thank you,   

 Christian Louboutin Team
